text: "Hallowed Be Thy Name" is a 1982 song by English heavy metal band Iron Maiden and is the final track from their third studio album The Number of the Beast. The live version of the single charted in 1993 and went to number 16 in Ireland and number 9 in the United Kingdom. ==Track listing== ===UK 7" red vinyl=== ===UK 12" picture disc=== ===CD maxi single=== Category:1982 songs Category:Iron Maiden songs Category:Dream Theater songs Category:Heavy metal
title: Hallowed Be Thy Name (song)
